name: decretive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with the force of a decree (= an official statement that something must happen): decretive will God's decretive will is his will that something will be or happen a certain way. Humans can never know the decretive designs of God.
More examplesFewer examplesThey must act in keeping with the decretive will of God.If moral laws were God's decretive will, our free choice would not be involved in obeying them.They accept that God's decretive will also includes the actions of man.
